author: sourceforge-tim273
msg: Added documentation and other minor changes

author: ammulder
msg: Example of how the security interface could be revised.
- The security service is responsible for tracking the current user
- None of this passing a class as an argument stuff
- We don't expect an arbitrary security service to understand
the caller identity object constructed by the OpenEJB server
- The SecurityService interface has exactly 3 methods for the 3
- The server works in conjunction with a security service, since the
server gets the authentication information in the first place.
